title: Kadavul Thantha Lyrics Maayavi
stanzas:
Kadavul thantha
azhagiya vazhvu
ulagam muzhuvadhum
avanadhu veedu
kangal moodiye
vazhthu paadu

karunai pongum
ullangal undu
kanneer thudaikkum
kaigalum undu
innum vazhanum
nooru aandu

edhai naam
ingu kondu vanthom
edhai naan
angu kondu selvom

naamellaam swasikka
thani thani kaatru
kidaiyaathu
megangal megangal
idangalai pozhiyaadhu

Kadavul thantha
azhagiya vazhvu
ulagam muzhuvadhum
avanadhu veedu
kangal moodiye
vazhthu paadu
